name: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Klingon Honor Guard
name_original: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Klingon Honor Guard
description:
Star Trek: The Next Generation - Klingon Honor Guard is an action-shooter game developed by MicroProse Software. It came out on 09-02-1998. It was published by MicroProse. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Star Trek: The Next Generation - Klingon Honor Guard is available on PC.
